metadata.Title: CVE-2020-14381 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in the Linux kernelâ€™s futex implementation. This flawallows a local attacker to corrupt system memory or escalate theirprivileges when creating a futex on a filesystem that is about to beunmounted. The highest threat from this vulnerability is toconfidentiality, integrity, as well as system availability.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
